TopicTitle: What is the name of the mod?

Articles.Content:
Hi all.

A while back I used a particular mod, however I have forgotten its name.

It allowed me to view the tracking of my ship as it intercepts with another target (planet). If I remember correctly, I would place a node to go to Duna for instance, then I would effect the maneuver and would be able to view the tracking line from different angles and see exactly how it passes Duna. 

Anyone know which mod im referring to? Just need the name please.

Thanks.
Was it [PreciseNode](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47863-1-0-2-Precise-Node-1-1-3-Precisely-edit-your-maneuver-nodes) plus changing the focus or conics mode to view the trajectory?
That's it, Precise Node! Thanks for the help guys!!!
